review: Everyone of my friends wanted me to get the Amazon Fire TV, and I am, certainly, not disappointed only sorry that I waited so long
author: larmar

review: Super easy to use and a very intuitive UX. The voice activation on the remote took a while to get used to but is very easy to use. I've recommended it to friends and will continue to do so.
author: Karrie Kampf

review: The Amazon Fire TV is amazing! I am so glad I purchased it. We had been using the Apple TV as someone had given it to us as a gift. I've never understood the appeal of Apple and the Apple TV is awful - took forever to load, would stop working during a TV show or movie. I could go on and on about how bad the Apple TV is. So if you are considering the Amazon Fire TV - get it. It is absolutely the best!
author: Cheryl K. Crowley

review: I also have Roku at another home. Fire is better.
author: Hal Watson Jr. (halprof39@aol.com)

review: The FireTv and Netflix app do not work together. The video jumps frames. Doesn't stream correctly. I am on my third FireTv and it still doesn't work. It is not my internet connection. I use the wired instead of the wireless. My internet speed ranges from 40 to 60 mbps. I tried different cables. I even bought a new router thinking it would help but no luck. Netflix blames Amazon and Amazon blames Netflix. It just doesn't work correctly with Netflix.
author: Cycleboy189 "Cycleboy189"

review: Somewhat disappointed, thought I would be able to go from my PC to TV wireless.
author: John D

review: I got this one for my brother for Christmas. We have had one since they first came out. Recently, ours just died. I called customer service and they sent me a mailing label via email right away and I had a new Amazon Fire the next day. I put the defective one in the box, put on the label and took it to the UPS Store. Back to using it everyday. Nice product and excellent support.
